001package gust.backend.model;
002
003import com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListeningScheduledExecutorService;
004
005import javax.annotation.Nonnull;
006import java.util.Optional;
007import java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit;
008
009
010/**
011 * Operational options that can be applied to individual calls into the {@link ModelAdapter} framework. See individual
012 * options interfaces for more information.
013*/
014@SuppressWarnings("UnstableApiUsage")
015public interface OperationOptions {
016  /** @return Value to apply to the operation timeout. If left unspecified, the global default is used. */
017  default @Nonnull Optional<Long> timeoutValue() {
018    return Optional.empty();
019  }
020
021  /** @return Unit to apply to the operation timeout. If left unspecified, the global default is used. */
022  default @Nonnull Optional<TimeUnit> timeoutUnit() {
023    return Optional.empty();
024  }
025
026  /** @return Executor service that should be used for calls that reference this option set. */
027  default @Nonnull Optional<ListeningScheduledExecutorService> executorService() {
028    return Optional.empty();
029  }
030}
